title: Letters to the Editor:  Jesus Dealt With Virtue  Signaling a Long Time Ago
text:
In "Slavery, Anti-Semitism and Harvard's Missing Moral Compass" (op-ed, May 14), Ruth Wisse writes that Harvard's "indulgent self-blame is an escape from moral responsibility." More and more U.S. institutions, Disney notable among them, are indulging in such self-blame and trumpeting their righteous adoption of the woke agenda. Perhaps leaders of these institutions should read the Bible: "Be careful not to practice your righteousness in front of others to be seen by them. If you do, you will have no reward from your Father in heaven" (Matthew 6:1).

Henry Scott

Potomac, Md.
